turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Donna can you do me a huge favor?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing Turker, what can I do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a coffee before my next meeting or I am not going to make it through.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, where do you want the coffee from? There's a new place down the street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I am craving starbucks right now. The one in Germantown off of Century Blvd is open and they're not usually too busy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a grande cappucchino with honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What kind of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular 2% is fine with me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any flavors or anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I'm good with just honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many packets should I use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's say two packets. Can you also add cinnamon to the top? It makes me feel like I am in Europe.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Haha sure thing. Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you also add one of my Vital Proteins collagen packets to it? I like the extra bit it gives me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Just one packet/scoop?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah that should be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, to confirm, you'd like a grande cappuccino with one packet of honey, regular 2% milk, and some cinnamon on top. And a vital protiens packet.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that sounds great. Can you have it here ASAP?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm leaving now. Want it on your starbucks card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know I love those points. Thanks Donna!!!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem Turker!
